animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur.
🐾 I have whiskers and a tail.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail when I'm happy. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🚶 I go for walks with my owner.
🏡 I guard the house.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat weeds.
🐥 My babies are called ducklings.
🪶 I have feathers and webbed feet.

animal.question: I am big and gray and have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts.
🐘 I have big ears.
🌿 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
spots I have brown spots all over.
🍃 I like to eat acacia leaves

animal.question: I hop around and have a pouch for my baby. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I come from Australia.
🌱 I like to eat plants.
🦘 I am a marsupial.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.
🏞️ I live on the grassy plains.
👪 I live in groups called herds.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am an invertebrate.
🐙 My arms are called tentacles.
🎨 I can change colors.

animal.question: I fly at night and catch insects. People think I'm scary, but I'm helpful. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I am a mammal.
🌃 I use echolocation to find my way.
🍎 Some of my species eat fruit!

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell that carries my home on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am very slow.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏜️ Some of us live in deserts, others in the sea.

transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I have an engine.
👪 I can take your family places.
🛣️ You see me on the road.

transport.question: I float on the water and take people places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and can carry many people.
⚓ I often travel on the ocean.
💨 I might have sails or an engine.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I can take you to faraway lands.
☁️ You can see me above the clouds.
⛽ I use fuel to fly.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You can ride me in the park.
⛑️ It's good to wear a helmet when riding me.
🦶 You use your feet to move me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🚦 I stop at stations to pick up passengers.
🚝 Some of me go very fast!

transport.question: I drive on roads and stop to pick up many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I have many seats inside.
🛑 I often stop at bus stops.
🗺️ I follow a route.

transport.question: I'm like a car, but I take you anywhere you want, for a price! What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 You can call me using a phone.
🚖 I have a meter to count the cost.
🗺️ I know all the streets!

transport.question: I have a big ladder and help put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a loud siren.
👨‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.
💧 I carry water to fight fires.

transport.question: I rescue people who are hurt and take them to the hospital quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a siren and flashing lights.
🏥 I have doctors and nurses inside.
🩺 I help people feel better.

transport.question: I am a type of transport that helps build tall buildings. I can lift heavy materials high up in the air. What am I?

hints.text: 🏗️ I have a long arm that can swing around.
🚧 You can find me at construction sites.
🔩 I am used to put things in place.
